src_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ref_text: Long Mande, nambawan sekreteri bilong Nobel Commitee for Literature long Swedish Academy, i tokaut long pablik long redio progrem bilong Sveriges Radio long Sweden olsem, ol i bin no inap long toktok wantaim Bob Dylan long 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature we em bin winim, na ol i no wok long traim long toktok wantaim em.
hyp_text: I go long Monday, Sara Danius, sekretaris permanen blong Nobel Komiti long Litrjeri blong Swedi Akademi, i tokim pablik long radyo program long Sveriges Radio long Swedi, committee, no kisim Bob Dilen direkt long winim Nobel Prais long Litrjeri long 2016, i laikim abandun hem i go long hem.
